name: transaction-history-01
description: Financial transaction history with trend indicators

meta.container: w-full bg-surface min-h-svh flex px-4 py-12 items-center md:py-20 justify-center min-w-0
meta.details: Provides a detailed record of financial transactions with various service providers, featuring trend arrows indicating whether values are up or down. Built with shadcn/ui Button, Calendar, Card, and Popover components for an interactive filtering experience. Includes date range selection for easy transaction filtering. Ideal for billing dashboards, financial reports, and transaction monitoring interfaces.
